name: Flappy Guns
description:
Lock, load, and flap! Compete against players all over the world in this maniacal twist on the flapping genre.

Take aim and fire with the virtual reality shooting engine made famous in Guncrafter and Shooting Showdown. Then flap for your life as your opponent returns the favor! This wild multiplayer shootout is the ultimate test of skill.

Once you pull the trigger, you'll be hooked.

Featuring:
• Online multiplayer!
• Unlockable birds and guns!
• Mega addictive gameplay!
• Leaderboards and achievements!
• Virtual reality controls turn your device into a weapon of flap destruction!
